attributes.title: absolutely terrible
attributes.review: orange boy’s app is not good. very bad. i’m sad it was even on my phone in the first place. -100000000000000000000/10. never get it.

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: It absolutely sucked. Don’t get it!! It made my phone weird and it drained my battery!!

attributes.title: What a joke.
attributes.review: This app is absolutely hilarious! Fitting for a joke of a president we have. The information offered through this app is great for a laugh. Followed by pity for all of those who actually take this a credible use of information. 1 Star for the 1# news  rating. False advertising. 👌🏻

attributes.title: don’t ever get this app 👎
attributes.review: I downloaded this app a few hours ago and it was the worst app I have ever been on. It hacked my phone and got all of my information. My phone was straight glitching for hours. This app isn’t even useful for conservative/republican pieces of trash. I would rather slash my ankles using a razor scooter and eat popeye’s biscuits with no drink than ever use this app again. This app also promotes a tyrannical piece of absolute trash, a sexual predator, and a white supremacist. YEAH NO THANKS

attributes.title: Don’t be shy, rate one star
SO BADDDD
attributes.review: This app is literally WORTHLESS! Not only is the president horrible but his app is even worse i didnt think it could get worse than that. When i opened the app it was a blank screen with nothing on it. I guess i should have expected that tbh..

attributes.title: The absolute worst
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app, my cat threw up all over my lap. DO NOT DOWNLOAD, OR YOU WILL HAVE CAT PUKE ALL OVER YOU 🤢🤮

attributes.title: Don’t Download
attributes.review: I am baffled at how far the radical left are willing to go to destroy America😡. This app is a scam, the Democrats and China are trying to steal your information. My phone started to glitch when I downloaded it. I tried to make an online purchase and my card company said my card is blocked due to a suspicious activities
